allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Create comprehensive 90-day data seeder and fix database schema issues

- Created seed_comprehensive_90days.py management command to generate realistic 90-day historical data across all models
- Generates ~15,000+ records including orders, items, payments, stock transactions, waste logs, physical counts, and prep batches
- Implements realistic business patterns: weekday/weekend order variations, multiple user roles, recipe-based inventory tracking
- Fixed database schema mismatches:
  - Added cost_per_unit to Ingredient model via migration
  - Removed requires_bom column from Product model
  - Removed is_archived column from Order model
- Updated seed_data.py to use proper field names and work with corrected schema
- All seeders now run without errors and generate comprehensive test data

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>

)")
